channel.title: A school prank or a prank for any computers linked up on a network
channel.description:
firstly i dont know if anyone else has done this and if they have [u]sorry[/u]
first off make a bat file name it something like... prank.BAT
and in it put:
[code]@echo off @ HH:MM shutdown -r * [any message here][/code]
have fun :)
(note the hours and minutes are in 24hr time.
to start this just double click the bat file and leave lok ovr at someones computer and u should see them scratching there head wondering what went wrong)

item.title: A school prank or a prank for any computers linked up on a network
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

[quote=“deoxys505, post:7, topic:93144”]tried it and it won’t go away…really annoying, even after you close the bat file.

OMG i logged off, and it still ran!!!whats up with that???

im gonna restart now.[/quote][quote=“pizza pie, post:8, topic:93144”]ohh lol, i did that i had to resart also rofl!! its gay, after u close it, they keep coming… thats why no one will know what happened[/quote]you know, if you save to someones username and desktop, then change icon to something frequently used and change message to something like program has crashed press ok…lol that would be funny.

Read full topic

item.title: A school prank or a prank for any computers linked up on a network
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

lol, i just sit in school and when im bored i just come up with random pranks to piss off people lol, i love the one where it makes messages just appear and never stop, watch:

@echo off
:loop
title PRANKED!!!
cls
echo  YOU ARE BEING PRANKED, INITIALIZING!
msg * Try and press "OK" fast enough to make all of these dissappear!
goto loop

lol cool isnt it!?i know it is

Read full topic
